item.title: Trump Claims Kimmel Was “Fired” for “Lack of Talent” After ABC Late Night Show Pulled
item.description: The ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live!’ host’s comments on the Charlie Kirk shooting led to his show being “preempted indefinitely” on Thursday, leading the president to gloat over his longtime foe’s troubles.
